COMMENT: Country or country group, representing the primary geography for the variable.
Country or country group, representing the counterparty geography for the variable.
Unique identifier for a variable series (i.e., data flow) from the Bank for International Settlements (BIS).
Quantifiable attribute; description of what is being recorded.
Methodology for the collection of a variable over time.
Source where the variable is published.
Unit of measurement for the reported value.
Unique identifier for a variable from the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) data flow and key IDs, joinable to the timeseries table.
